explains: n. 选区，选区的选民；支持者，顾客

sentences.en: Unemployment is high in her constituency.
sentences.cn: 她的选区的失业人数居高不下。

sentences.en: He owns a house in his Darlington constituency.
sentences.cn: 他在自己的选区达灵顿拥有一座房子。

sentences.en: More research should be done regarding the molecular constituency of food.
sentences.cn: 应该对食物的分子组成进行更多的研究。
